vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.1.1;
son of: Zuph (H6689);
father of: Elihu (H0453); also called Nahath at 1Ch.6.26; Toah at 1Ch.6.34;
Another name of to.chu (תֹּחוּ "Tohu" H8459)
§ Toah = "lowly"
son of Zuph, father of Eliel, and ancestor of Samuel and Heman
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Suf; ancestro de Hemán; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
陀亞 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "卑微"
蘇弗的兒子, 以列的兒子, 希幔與撒母耳的先祖 (代上 6:34)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
陀亚 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "卑微"
苏弗的儿子, 以列的儿子, 希幔与撒母耳的先祖 (代上 6:34)
